topics.body:
I just ate a jumbo size hotdog, two poached eggs, baked beans, mushrooms, tomato slices, toast, avocado, hash browns and two strips of turkey bacon, and drank 3 cups of Earl Grey tea and a cup of orange juice.
I'm still hungry yet I'm slim.

That is God's gift to me.
